general_advisory: Rainfall is expected during the next five days. Farmers are advised to do proper arrangement for storing rainwater in the field. Take plant protection measures for pest and disease build-up. Ensure proper drainage system in non-paddy crop fields.

advisory: Apply low quantity of nitrogen fertilizer to reduce the blast disease.
Complete the transplanting. Use 4-5 seedlings/hill in age-old seedlings with closed spacing.
Develop a better drainage system to avoid waterlogging conditions due to excess rainfall.
Root and stalk rot may observe in maize field, to control it spray Validamycin 3% L.
Prepare the field and raise groundnut of high-yielding varieties. Treat the seeds before sowing.
Condition is favorable for blast incidence in ragi, if observed, spray Zineb 75% WP when the sky becomes clear.
Transplant 25-35 days old seedlings in the main field.
Make necessary drainage channels to prevent waterlogging conditions.
There is a chance of downy mildew attack in cucumber. If observed, spray Metalaxyl.
Go for weeding and apply urea per acre at 45 days after planting.
If Leaf gall and thrips occur, spray Monocrotophos or neem oil.
Go for weeding and apply urea per acre at 45 days after planting.
Maintain/creating optimum shade for stem borer management.
